ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:29:51 [Issue ID 4000-311859] urn:comicvine:4000-311859 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 05:17:49. [Issue ID 260363]
ComicInfo.Summary: In the second volume, "The Day I Tried To Live", a young couple in the early 20th century is travelling to a remote spot in the desert to take care of some personal business. There, they run into a Mission run by a race of insects that have been living in secret among us. The insects didn't bargain for the couple being a prototype Bonnie and Clyde, though, and find humanity a worthier adversary than they expected.
ComicInfo.Title: The Day I Tried to Live - Part One
